import React, { Component } from 'react' import { Link, Redirect } from 'react-router-dom' import { WithAuthConsumer } from '../context/AuthContext' import LogOut from '../../assets/images/menu/logout.png' class Lateral extends Component { constructor(props){ super(props) this.state = { data: { profilePicture: this.props.currentUser.profilePicture, } } } handleLogout = () => { this.logout() return } render(){ console.log(this.props) return (
